sub_topic: Calculating the surface area of a cube.
message_1: A cube has a side length of 5 cm. What is the surface area of the cube in square centimeters?
message_2:
A cube has 6 faces, and the area of each face is the square of the side length. So, the surface area of the cube can be calculated as follows:

Surface area = 6 × (side length)^2
Surface area = 6 × (5 cm)^2
Surface area = 6 × 25 cm^2
Surface area = 150 cm^2
